thread.title: 3 night stay ruined by Front desk in charge Ayush
thread.title_full: 3 night stay ruined by Front desk in charge Ayush - Review of Holiday Inn Express Earls Court, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Yeshwanth R
title: 3 night stay ruined by Front desk in charge Ayush
text:
Overall it is a great place to stay but service levels are pathetic with folks like Ayush who was at the front desk and who cuts the call on your issues at room about the power chArger sockets not working and after repeated follow up and not picking the call he send in Mr. Frank and I must say Frank was a thorough professional and gentleman and he saved the day for us. I am surprised to see folks like Ayush or what ever the name
Of the individual is who is very confrontational and seems to me that his personal issues are carried forward to his work place. I am very surprised to see him employed in a professional set up of Holiday Inn chain and he does not deserve to be part of this great hospitality chain. I hope my feedback is taken in the right context and corrective action implemented ASAP. Would be happy to chat with anyone from Holiday Inn chain should they have any need to contact me to implement the corrective action.
Yeshwanth Reddy
